precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over an empty area of the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu labeled "Arrange Icons By" will appear, offering options such as "Refresh," "Paste," "Paste Shortcut," "New," and "Properties."

precondition: A right-click context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By' is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Appearance' tab is visible.
expected_results: The 'Appearance' tab will become the selected tab, and its settings will be displayed.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open with the 'Themes' tab active.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will display the 'Screen Saver' tab and its corresponding settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu currently displays 'Windows XP'.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will display 'None'.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu should be open.
action: Click the "3D FlowerBox" item in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close. The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will become active. A "Wait:" spin box (set to "10") and an unchecked "On resume, password protect" checkbox will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Apply' button.
expected_results: The changes made in the 'Screen Saver' tab will be applied, and the mouse cursor will move to the 'Power...' button.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the button labeled "Power..." at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu should display 'After 20 mins'.
action: Click the 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu and select 'Never'.
expected_results: The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu will now display 'Never'.

precondition: The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu in the 'Power Options Properties' window is open.
action: Click the 'After 4 hours' option in the 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close and 'After 4 hours' will be displayed as the selected option for 'Turn off hard disks'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme should be selected in the dropdown menu, and all power management options should be set to "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
